enhanced_description: Global WFM Forum (GWFM) is a prominent non-profit professional organization and the largest Global Chartered Body and network specializing in Workforce Management (WFM). Founded in 2014 and headquartered in Bengaluru, it comprises senior WFM and HR professionals dedicated to advancing the WFM movement worldwide. GWFM focuses on enhancing the capabilities of WFM and HR professionals through new courses designed with demanding skills and practical knowledge, aiming to foster global competitiveness and create societal value. A key objective is to build a more diverse and inclusive workforce, supported by its initiatives around workforce and employee diversity, including work for NGOs.
